title: Interpretability and Transparency-Driven Detection and Transformation of Textual Adversarial Examples (IT-DT). (arXiv:2307.01225v1 [cs.CL])
abstract: Transformer-based text classifiers like BERT, Roberta, T5, and GPT-3 have shown impressive performance in NLP. However, their vulnerability to adversarial examples poses a security risk. Existing defense methods lack interpretability, making it hard to understand adversarial classifications and identify model vulnerabilities. To address this, we propose the Interpretability and Transparency-Driven Detection and Transformation (IT-DT) framework. translated_title: 解释性和透明性驱动的文本对抗示例的检测与转换（IT-DT）
translated_abstract: 基于Transformer的文本分类器如BERT、Roberta、T5和GPT-3在自然语言处理方面展示了令人印象深刻的性能。然而，它们对于对抗性示例的脆弱性提出了安全风险。现有的防御方法缺乏解释性，很难理解对抗性分类并识别模型的漏洞。为了解决这个问题，我们提出了解释性和透明性驱动的检测与转换（IT-DT）框架。它专注于在检测和转换文本对抗示例时的解释性和透明性。IT-DT利用注意力图、集成梯度和模型反馈等技术进行解释性检测。这有助于识别对对抗性分类有贡献的显著特征和扰动词语。在转换阶段，IT-DT利用预训练的嵌入和模型反馈来生成扰动词语的最佳替代。通过找到合适的替换，我们的目标是将对抗性示例转换为正常示例。
tldr: 通过提出的解释性和透明性驱动的检测与转换（IT-DT）框架，我们在检测和转换文本对抗示例方面注重解释性和透明性。这个框架利用了注意力图、集成梯度和模型反馈等技术，在检测阶段有助于识别对对抗性分类有贡献的显著特征和扰动词语，并在转换阶段使用预训练的嵌入和模型反馈来生成扰动词语的最佳替代，以将对抗性示例转换为正常示例。
en_tdlr: With the Interpretability and Transparency-Driven Detection and Transformation (IT-DT) framework, we focus on interpretability and transparency in detecting and transforming textual adversarial examples. By utilizing techniques such as attention maps, integrated gradients, and model feedback, we can identify salient features and perturbed words contributing to adversarial classifications during detection. In the transformation phase, IT-DT employs pre-trained embeddings and model feedback to generate optimal replacements for perturbed words, aiming to convert adversarial examples into normal examples.
